name: @nichoth/tap-ssc
description: Run tests in a browser environment from the command line

scripts.test: cd example && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i && npm test
scripts.test-fail: cd example && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i && npm run test-fail
scripts.test-err: cd example && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i --silent && npm run test-err

author: nichoth
